hadith.text: Narrated Zayd ibn Khalid al-Juhani: A man from the Companions of the Prophet (ï·º) died on the day of Khaybar. They mentioned the matter to the Messenger of Allah. He said: Offer prayer over your companion. When the faces of the people looked perplexed, he said: Your companion misappropriated booty in the path of Allah. We searched his belongings and found some Jewish beads not worth two dirhams
